main.title: Stepan Fedyanov Frontend Developer
main.about_text: Front-end developer, specializing in the development of web applications and interfaces using Vue JS. I also have experience with React and Angular frameworks. I have developed more than 20 projects, 15 of which have received the highest rating from the customer. I have received a special "Rising Star" status for the speed and quality of my work. I am currently a developer at the Art. Lebedev Studio in the Nikolay Ironov project.

education.1: CS50’s Web Programming with Python and JavaScript

freelance.title: Freelance
freelance.time: January 2022 to May 2023 (1 year and 5 months)

tasks.0: Developed websites from scratch using CMS such as Bitrix, Wordpress, Django, Strapi
tasks.1: Worked on enhancements and refactoring of existing websites using HTML/CSS, JavaScript, ReactJS, VueJS
tasks.3: Worked on UI development and UX research
tasks.2: Provided technical support for websites over several months: working with content, update UI and update software
tasks.4: Developed Telegram bots using Python aiogram
tasks.5: Profile on freelance platform: kwork.ru/user/by_fedyanov
